ilog.cplex

Interface IloModelingAssistance.Callback

  • Enclosing class:
    IloModelingAssistance

    public static interface IloModelingAssistance.Callback
    Interface for modeling assistance callbacks.

    Any class to be used as a modeling assistance callback must implement this interface.

    See Also:
    IloCplex.use(IloModelingAssistance.Callback)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void invoke(int issueid, java.lang.String message)
      Invoked by the modeling assistance callback.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        void invoke(int issueid,
          java.lang.String message)
            throws IloException
        Invoked by the modeling assistance callback.

        If an object is registered with CPLEX by means of the method IloCplex.use(IloModelingAssistance.Callback), then CPLEX will invoke this function of the registered object for each modeling assistance warning. These warnings will not be displayed in the engine log as they are by default when no callback is registered. For values of issueid, see the constants in IloModelingAssistance.

        Note: CPLEX will only invoke this function if the CPLEX parameter IloCplex.Param.Read.DataCheck is set to IloCplex.DataCheck.Assist. In addition, the parameter IloCplex.Param.Read.WarningLimit controls the number of times each type of modeling assistance warning will be reported (the rest will be ignored). See CPX_PARAM_DATACHECK and CPX_PARAM_WARNLIM in the Parameters of CPLEX Reference Manual.

        Throws:
        IloException - in order to indicate any sort of error.
        Parameters:
        issueid - The modeling assistance issue ID.
        message - The modeling assistance warning string.
